document.full_text: alexandre burrows struck 11 seconds into overtime to lift the vancouver canucks to a 3-2 win over the boston bruins on saturday, moving them into a 2-0 series lead and halfway to their first stanley cup.
document.title: burrows pounces in ot as canucks go 2-0 up
lines_and_colors: alexandre burrows struck 11 seconds into overtime to lift the vancouver canucks to a 3-2 win over the boston bruins on saturday, moving them into a 2-0 series lead and halfway to their first stanley cup.
